thread.title: SRK wishes good luck to Salman Khan for 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo'
thread.title_full: SRK wishes good luck to Salman Khan for 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: SRK wishes good luck to Salman Khan for 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo'
text:
Superstar Shah Rukh Khan has wished good luck and sent out love to Salman Khan for his forthcoming film 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' (PRDP).
*Watch: 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' trailer is out!**Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan. File pic*
During a chat session with Twitterati, when a question about “what would he like to say ... »
